data.lyric:
[ti:Zombie]
[ar:Bad Wolves]
[al:Zombie]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Zombie - Bad Wolves
[00:13.76]Another head hangs lowly
[00:18.79]Child is slowly taken
[00:25.95]And the violence causes silence
[00:31.24]Who are we mistaken
[00:37.02]But you see it's not me
[00:39.82]It's not my family
[00:42.96]In your head in your head they are fighting
[00:49.21]With their tanks and their bombs
[00:52.33]And their bombs and their drones
[00:55.40]In your head in your head they are crying
[01:04.86]What's in your head in your head
[01:10.92]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie
[01:17.34]What's in your head in your head
[01:23.51]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie oh
[01:31.83]Another mother's breakin'
[01:36.73]Heart is takin' over
[01:43.83]When the violence causes silence
[01:49.17]We must be mistaken
[01:54.74]It's the same old theme
[01:57.77]In two thousand eighteen
[02:01.00]In your head in your head they're still fightin'
[02:07.09]With their tanks and their bombs
[02:10.24]And their guns and their drones
[02:13.35]In your head in your head they are dyin'
[02:19.73]What's in your head in your head
[02:25.85]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie
[02:32.10]What's in your head in your head
[02:38.33]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie oh
[03:09.78]It's the same old theme
[03:12.61]In two thousand eight-teen
[03:15.73]In your head in your head they're dyin'
[03:22.03]What's in your head in your head
[03:28.18]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie
[03:34.41]What's in your head in your head
[03:40.60]Zombie zombie zombie-ie-ie oh
data.trans:
[ti:Zombie]
[ar:Bad Wolves]
[al:Zombie]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:17.20]又一颗低垂的头颅
[00:22.04]孩子被缓缓夺去性命
[00:27.85]
[00:29.34]残暴造就了沉寂
[00:34.48]到底谁是罪魁祸首
[00:40.18]但你明白 不是我
[00:43.05]更不是我的家人
[00:46.10]你的脑海中浮现出手足相残的残忍画面
[00:52.50]开着坦克 拿着炸弹
[00:55.53]所有武器一起上阵
[00:58.68]你的脑海中浮现出众人悲泣的画面
[01:05.32]
[01:08.12]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[01:14.15]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
[01:20.52]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[01:26.73]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
[01:34.36]
[01:35.07]又一位母亲破碎的心
[01:39.99]被无情夺去
[01:45.71]
[01:47.10]残暴造就了沉寂
[01:52.59]我们都是罪魁祸首
[01:58.12]在二零一八年
[02:00.96]同样的悲剧再次上演
[02:04.19]在你脑海中 他们依然在自相残杀
[02:10.40]开着坦克 拿着炸弹
[02:13.48]所有武器一起上阵
[02:16.59]你脑海中浮现出他们奄奄一息的画面
[02:22.90]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[02:29.05]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
[02:35.47]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[02:41.52]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
[02:49.17]
[03:12.88]在二零一八年
[03:15.79]同样的悲剧再次上演
[03:18.91]你脑海中浮现出他们奄奄一息的画面
[03:25.19]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[03:31.37]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
[03:37.64]你的脑海中浮现出怎样的画面
[03:43.86]行尸走肉 行尸走肉
